sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"使分散，使散开"之意。
means: scatter ： 普通用词，指用暴力等手段使人或物向四处散开，或把物随意撒开。
disperse ： 多指把一群人或物等彻底驱散。
spread ： 指一直延伸、蔓延，侧重遍及。
diffuse ： 指光线、声音或气味等在空中传送或散布，强调覆盖面积与物质分布相对密度之间的关系。

word_mean: 分散：组分的分散，如分散在胶体中的微粒，亦指已如此分散的微粒

sentence.Network_en: Police fired shots and used teargas to disperse the demonstrators.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方鸣枪并使用催泪弹来驱散示威者。

sentence.Network_en: Seven people were wounded when soldiers fired rubber bullets to disperse crowds.
sentence.Network_cn: 士兵发射橡皮子弹驱散人群时有7个人受了伤。

sentence.Network_en: Police moved in to disperse the crowd.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 分字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 分权〖 separationofpowers〗 分散〖 disperse;scatter;decentralize〗 分色〖 colourseparation〗.
龙腾世纪2_百度百科 ... 5.Scatter 溃散 6.Disperse 驱散（disperse） 7.Shield Bash 盾牌猛击.
字典中渫字的解释 ... (3) 泄漏[ leak] (4) 散布;消散[ disperse] ◎ 渫 xi&#232.
衍字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 溢出,水满而出〖 overflow〗 散开〖 disperse〗 分布〖 bedistributed〗.

list.abs: 电力常用英语 - bingwuo的日志 - 网易博客 ... 分散地 dispersedly 分散度 dispersity 分油器 oil separator.
dispersing lens 色散透镜dispersion 【光】色散dispersive power 【光】色散率
广州双键贸易有限公司 ... 内增塑型单体 Internal Plasticizing Monomer 分散剂 Dispersant 润湿流平剂 Leveling Wetting Agent.
机械词汇的英语翻译(A-G) ... dispersed phase 分散相 dispersibility 分散性 dispersing agent 分散剂.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin dispers- 'scattered', from the verb dispergere, from dis- 'widely' + spargere 'scatter, strew'

entry.def: When something disperses or when you disperse it, it spreads over a wide area.

example.ex: The oil appeared to be dispersing...
The intense currents disperse the sewage...

entry.def: When a group of people disperses or when someone disperses them, the group splits up and the people leave in different directions.

example.ex: Police fired shots and used teargas to disperse the demonstrators...
example.tran: 警方鸣枪并使用催泪弹来驱散示威者。

example.ex: The crowd dispersed peacefully after prayers.
example.tran: 祈祷仪式过后，人们静静散去。

sentences.sentence: "He scattered gun powder under the wagon"

means.word_mean: 2. to cause to separate and go in different directions;

sentences.sentence: "She waved her hand and scattered the crowds"
"The children scattered in all directions when the teacher approached";

auth_sentence.content: Police used a water cannon to disperse the crowd.
auth_sentence.res_content: Police used a water cannon to disperse the crowd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Police used a water cannon to disperse the crowd.

auth_sentence.content: When the caterpillars liquefy they disperse the virus downward.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the caterpillars liquefy they disperse the virus downward.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the caterpillars liquefy they disperse the virus downward.

auth_sentence.content: Police disperse Yerevan protests amid arrests and accusations of brutality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Police disperse Yerevan protests amid arrests and accusations of brutality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Police disperse Yerevan protests amid arrests and accusations of brutality.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 散布, 驱散, 传播, 散射
stems_affixes.word_buile: disperse[v.[使]分散;[使]散开;疏散]+ion表名词→n.散布, 驱散, 传播, 散射

stems_affixes.value_cn: 散布, 布置, 点缀
stems_affixes.word_buile: intersperse[v.散布,点缀]+ion表名词→n.散布, 布置, 点缀
inter在……中间+spers散开+e→在中间散开

sentences.en: After school the children dispersed to their homes.
sentences.cn: 放学后, 孩子们四散回家了。

jushi.english: The crowd dispersed when the police arrived.
After school the children dispersed to their homes.
jushi.chinese: 放学后,孩子们各自回家了。
